vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.32;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928) and Hepher (H2660A);
father of: Ahian (H0291), Shechem (H7928H), Likhi (H3949) and Aniam (H0593)
Group of she.mi.da (שְׁמִידָ֑ע "Shemida" H8061)
§ Shemidaites = see Shemida "wise"
descendants of Shemida, the son of Gilead and grandson of Manasseh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Semidá; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示米大族 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 示米大 "英明的"
瑪拿西的孫子基列的兒子示米大的後裔(民 26:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示米大族 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 见 示米大 "英明的"
玛拿西的孙子基列的儿子示米大的后裔(民 26:32)
